meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed by my history course and uncertain about my future
meeting_request.description: Hi, I'm Chelsea, a first-year History major. Last semester was really tough for me, and I started to feel a lot of anxiety and uncertainty about where I’m even going. I took a lot of history classes, and I ended up taking at least 10 different ones, including European and American history, World War II, and early modern Europe. I ended up taking about 3/4 of my load in one semester, and I ended up with a C+ average. I’m still struggling to balance schoolwork and personal life, and I’m worried that I’m not measuring up to what I’m doing in class or how I’m showing up. I’m really feeling like I’m not in control of what I’m doing or where I’m heading, and I’m worried I’m not going to graduate on time because of all the stress I’m putting in.
